text: The Dog Who Saved Easter is an American family romantic comedy movie. It was released on March 18, 2014. The movie is a direct-to-video production. It was directed by Sean Olson. The movie is the second movie to feature Zeus the dog. The first movie is called The Dog Who Saved Christmas Vacation (2010). == Cast == *Dean Cain as Ted Stein *Elisa Donovan as Belinda Bannister *Beverley Mitchell as Alice *Patrick Muldoon as Fred Stein *Catherine Hicks as Cressida *Mario Lopez as Zeus (voice) *Joey Diaz as Stewey (as Joey 'Coco' Diaz) *Nicole Eggert as Gabrielle (voice) *Matthew Lawrence as Will *Mindy Sterling as Grandma *Tiffany Thornton as Karen == Other websites == * Category:2014 romantic comedy movies Category:2010s family movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American family movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: The Dog Who Saved Easter
